question: You are interested in applying for a new position at your company but have somequestions. Write a letter to your boss.In your letter include:• Which position you are considering• What questions you have about it• How your boss can help you decide whether or not to apply
text: I am writing this letter with reference to your recent advertisement on the LinkedIn website. I am knee to apply for the technical architect position in the cloud computing domain. As my educational qualification and domain expertise suit the requirement. I am going to canvass the stated theme and elucidate copious motives in the forthcoming paragraphs.

As I have deep insight knowledge and hands-on experience in a plethora of technologies. In addition to this, I have user interface design skills also. I consider my credentials exactly equivalent to referred architect role in your company. I would like to know  If you are looking for Azure or Google cloud certification and a front-end design skill set. If so, I have great knowledge in all cloud-related domains.

So, I request you to have a glance at my attached resume where  I mentioned all my educational background and  related experience throughout  my IT career. Please let me know  If my profile suits the requirement.
Should you have any concerns or further clarifications, Please do not hesitate to call on my mobile. I am looking forward to hearing from you.
